table.name: Megafauna World Encounters
table.caption: Megafauna World Encounters
rows: {@dice 2d4} {@creature Giant Ox|BGG|giant oxen} (attitude: {@dice 1d6 + 4}) grazing on shrubs, trees, or thatched roofs
{@dice 1d3} {@creature Titanothere|BGG|titanotheres} (attitude: {@dice 1d8 + 3}) roaming; one of them scratches an itch on trees, uprooting them in the process
1 {@creature giant goose|BGG} (attitude: {@dice 1d8}) running with an item from a hill giant's bag (see "{@book Giant Bags|BGG|5|Giant Bags}" in {@book chapter 5|BGG|5}) in its mouth
2 {@creature Mammoth||mammoths} (attitude: {@dice 1d6}) locking tusks in a territory dispute
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Saber-Toothed Tiger||saber-toothed tigers} (attitude: {@dice 1d10}) stalking near a herd of {@dice 2d4} {@creature giant elk} (attitude: {@dice 1d6 + 3})
1 {@creature purple worm} (attitude: {@dice 1d4 + 1}) following vibrations toward food
{@dice 2d6} {@creature Giant Tick|BGG|giant ticks} (attitude: {@dice 1d4 + 1}) sucking the last blood from a giant's corpse
1 {@creature froghemoth|MPMM} (attitude: {@dice 1d6}) trying to hide somewhere comically inadequate for its bulk
